name: Pirate Patrol
description:
The security of Federation trade routes is crucial for the survival of civilization.

Remember, even Rome was an empire built on trade routes. However, protecting these lucrative trade routes from greedy pirate clans is no easy task.

This new assignment will present critical decisions that require your attention. Are you prepared to send your valuable pilots against these pirate gangs? Can you risk the lives of your comrades to protect the unmanned cargo ships of rich corporations? There will be times when you must choose between losing cargo boxes or risking human life.

Alternatively, will you be able to recall disobedient pilots who change their targets despite orders back to the hangar in the middle of a heated conflict?

As an officer in active combat, you are well aware that every asteroid, bullet, and enemy ship poses a significant risk. Space is no joke, commander! If you do not manage your ship with discipline, you may find yourself saluting from behind the flags of the coffins of your soldiers.

Being a commander is a significant responsibility.


  • Manage anti-piracy operations and secure trade lines,
  • Command your carier and send your fighter pilots on missions,
  • Find and train new officers and pilots, on procedural game universe map.
  • Equip your ship with new weapons and equipment,

You set your own missions:



  • Rush to the aid of attacked ships,
  • Rescue pilots and crews thrown into space from damaged ships.
  • Investigate anomalies that have caught the attention of scientists.
  • Go after pirate gangs.
  • Set out to find out what happened in the colonies where communication was lost.
  • Scan the area under your responsibility and uncover lurking pirates.


  • 2D design that provides full control over the battle map
  • Advanced AI-controlled pilots and enemies that can make their own decisions
  • Procedural maps – Every game is a new adventure
  • Many loot and a detailed inventory management
  • Different approaches of pilots and officers with different characters to every situation
  • Destructible environmental factors, asteroids, shipwrecks, old stations, space junk
  • Advanced sound effects and impressive soundtracks

What is Smart-Pause Game (SPG)


We developed the Smart-Pause Game (SPG) interface, which combines the tactical richness of Turn-based Strategy games with the action richness of Real-Time Strategy games.With SPG interface, the game will “pause” intelligently, allowing the player to make tactical decisions with ease, while the player will be thinking broadly, planning and putting their tactics into practice without getting lost in a fast-paced game.
